column4: Hi I just installed ubuntu and when it loads my screen is all screwed up- all I see is a white and black cross hatch on the screen, But I do see my mouse as well. I have an ATI radeon 9200. Is there any way to fix this from Bash by starting in recovery mode?
gimme just a sec., i will try and help you
sorry i have to jet... you have to edit a file in /etc/X11/xorg.conf . I am sorry, but this is kind of an emergency.
